dct_title_s: Map of the city of New-York, 1852
dct_description_sm: "Lith. by Geo. Hayward, 120 Water Str., N.Y. for D.T. Valentine's Manual, 1852." Shows ward boundaries, parks, fire districts, and piers. Covers Manhattan south of 57th St. Inset shows Manhattan north of 57th St., including proposed Central Park. Includes fire alarm information.
dct_publisher_sm: [New York, N.Y. : Common Council, 1852] (N.Y. : Lith. by Geo. Hayward)
